StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetEduca.onLevel]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Type char(1) = 'E' AS
SELECT EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE, CASE @Type WHEN 'O' THEN EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE + ' - ' ELSE SPACE(0) END + EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION AS EDUCATION_LEVEL_DESCRIPTION FROM EDUCATION_LEVEL WHERE TYPE = @Type ORDER BY CASE @Type WHEN 'O' THEN CASE ISNUMERIC(EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE) WHEN 1 THEN CONVERT(INT, EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE) ELSE ASCII(EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE) END ELSE CONVERT(INT, EDUCATION_LEVEL_CODE) END
